Package com.esri.mo2.map.elt

Provides classes and interfaces for a common set of map elements that can be added directly or indirectly to either UI-based or non-UI-based ElementContainer(s).

See:
          Description

Class Summary
BaseBackgroundLayer The class provides a support of drawing background for the given Element object.
BaseBorderLayer The BaseBorderLayer class helps to define how the border of a given Element is drawn.
BaseDropshadowLayer The class BaseDropshadowLayer provides a support of drawing a shadow effect for a given Element.
BaseElement The abstract class provides an essential implementation of the inferface com.esri.mo2.map.core.Element.
BaseGroupElement This is the base class for GroupElement.
BaseLegend The BaseLegend implements the Legend interface model.It will draw a Legend on the given graphics contents for the showing layers on the map.
BaseNorthArrow The class draws a north arrow on the given graphic content.
BaseScaleBar The class draws a scale bar on the given graphic contents.
EllipseElement EliipseElement is a GraphicElement drawing an ellipse shape.
FeatureElement The FeatureElement is a Element class wrapping up a com.esri.mo2.data.feat.Feature object to draw the feature in an element container with a given renderer.
GraphicElement A GraphicElement is an abstract Element containing a feature geometry and rendering symbol.
ImageElement This class draws an image on any element container.
LegendElement A generic implementation for Legend element.
LegendItem A LegendItem class is corresponding to one type of features in the map.
LegendProperties A supporting class of LegendElement defines properties and constants for drawing a legend.
LegendStyleFactory A LegendStyleFactory is a class to create a legend feature based on the patch width, height and style;
MapElement This class wraps up a Map bean as an element.
MarkerElement A MarkerElement is a GraphicElement containing a point feature geometry.
NorthArrowElement This class provides functions for drawing a north arrow element.
OverviewMapElement This class wraps OverviewMap bean as an element.
PolygonElement PolygonElement is a graphic element with a closed geometry.
PolylineElement PolylineElement is a GraphicElement containing a series of paths.
RectangleElement A RectangleElement is GraphicElemet with drawing a rectangle shape.
ScaleBarElement This class provides functions for drawing a scale bar element.
TextElement This class provides functions for drawing a text element.
 

Package com.esri.mo2.map.elt Description

Provides classes and interfaces for a common set of map elements that can be added directly or indirectly to either UI-based or non-UI-based ElementContainer(s).

This package includes all supported map elements in MapObjects Java. These classes have been wrapped as visual components in package com.esri.mo2.ui.lyt (layout) that can be manipulated by end users through tools provided in the layout package. The same classes can also be added to a non-visual ElementContainer that can provide functionality for manipulating (adding, deleting, etc.) map elements, or exporting all the elements to a file, or printing out elements as a map. For the layout package, please see Layout package decription.
